author: James Martin
method: Whisk the cream until just holding its shape. Fold in the cocoa, sugar and orange juice. In a glass, layer the mousse and orange segments. Top with fig rounds and a dollop of Greek-style yoghurt.
ingredients: 85-110ml/3-4 fl oz double cream,  1 tbsp cocoa powder,  1 tbsp icing sugar,  1 orange, juice only,  1 orange, segmented,  1 fig, sliced into rounds,  1 tbsp Greek-style yoghurt
